name: Chicken Blood
description:
I made a 3d horror game, in unity. And it has a doggo.

Game made for Theme Roulette 4 

Why did I decided to make a 3d unity game for a rpgmaker website? 

Why did I decide to upload on itch.io instead there? 

Let the random roulette decide.

You're trapped in a asylum and now you need to find keys to get out.  Simple? Perfect.

A small, horror game made by an inexperienced developer. It's my first 3D (and hopefully last) so please don't expect much.
